attributes.action: Set the people free, Stop slavery, repeal all laws above natural, common law
attributes.additional_details:
The certification is signed by the registrar, who is commissioned by the government or state agency, which is a permanent or semi-permanent organization
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Government_agency
We are not numbers or articles or objects to be traded. REPEAL ALL LAWS above COMMON LAW
attributes.background: The compulsory registration of births with government agencies is a practice that originated in the U.K in 1853. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Birth_certificate, before this people were born FREE MEN and WOMAN

rejection.details: We're not sure what you mean by "repeal all laws above common law". We could accept a petition to change the rules around birth registrations, if there's a specific change that you'd like to see.
